item.title: .htaccess: サンプルコード #10
item.description: RewriteEngine On RewriteBase / RewriteCond %{SERVER_PORT} 80 RewriteRule ^(.*)$ http://example.com/$1 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{SERVER_PORT} 443 RewriteRule ^(.*)$ https://example.com/$1 [R=301,L]
